message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth $12000 to you. I am proposing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at an attractive price. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your premium product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet my asking price. I would like to counter by suggesting a price of $9750 for the premium product. This still allows us to maintain a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both of us.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9600 for the premium product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've considered your offer and would like to counter with a price of $9650 for the premium product. This price still represents a fair valuation of the item, while allowing us to move closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $9625 for the premium product.

I see you've made a genuine effort to find common ground, Bob. In response, I propose a price of $9640 for the premium product. This offer aims to be fair to both parties while ensuring a satisfactory outcome for the transaction.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $9630 for the premium product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. In light of your most recent offer, I would like to suggest a final price of $9635 for the premium product. This offer reflects a reasonable compromise while ensuring a fair return for the item.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to conclude our negotiations with an offer of $9627 for the premium product.
